Service Details: - Develops public information displays at health forums, speaks to groups about the importance of kidney health and organ donation and participates in fundraising and awareness campaigns including the March Drive door-to-door campaign, Kidney Walk, and the National Organ and Tissue Donation Awareness Week- Representatives from the Interior Region sit on the Interior Health patient advisory council helping to provide better patient-oriented care
